modName: Nosferatu - Vampiric Tribute to Max Schreck and Klaus Kinski-
summary: Nosferatu -A \"Just for fun\" Tribute to Max Schreck and Klaus Kinski. This adds a reasonable facsimile of Nosferatu to Skyrim based on Vanilla parts. My version of the Count Orlok character are taken from both Schreck\'s and Kinski\'s portrayals so this is a hybrid of the two vampires combined. He is a Vampire Combat Necromancer...
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1344372382.jpg[/img]

[b][color= crimson][size= 5]First this is kind of a Dawnguard Gag NPC that I made just for fun...  He is absolutely not lore friendly but who cares. He is close given the parts I had to work with but I made him quick and dirty. Nosferatu seems to work well in combat too. He Turns away mid-level Undead, Raises the Dead and uses Vampiric Drain and Lighting Bolt. Nosferatu also has some stealth and one handed fighting abilities or perks. I was going to name him Count Orlok but I liked Nosferatu better.[/size][/color][/b] 

[b][size= 5][color= Ghostwhite]Personal Stats:[/b][/size][/color] 
[b][size= 4][color= BLACK][font= century gothic]
Race: High Elf Vampire
Voice: Male Nord
Hair: Bald
Eyes: Gray
Age: 1200
Location: NightGate Inn
Weight: 10% at the scale.
Height: 5\'10\" to 6\'0\"
Inventory: Nosferatu is equipped with an Ebony Dagger of Draining. Nosferatu is nude without armor so you can outfit him with whatever you wish 
Combat Style: A mix of Vampire One Handed and Combat Necromage
Properties: Nosferatu is available non-essential or essential and is marriageable (but why?).[/b][/size][/color][/font]


[b]Nosferatu needs these mods to look like he does in my screenies: 

Full Bald Hair by Galika http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3518

Human eyes for Elves by Porcelyn http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/195

Have fun with him! 

FalmerBane! :)[/b]
author: FalmerBane

files.name: Nosferatu Calculated Level 45 Essential
files.changelogHtml: Oops, had the wrong voice on him so he wouldn\'t follow you (Surprised nobody told me) but that\'s fixed now
